abstract: Israeli soldier fatally shoots Palestinian man during confrontation over attempted theft of vehicle.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli soldier fatally wounded a Palestinian on Wednesday in a confrontation over an attempt to steal a vehicle in the occupied West Bank, the police said.
snippet: An Israeli soldier fatally wounded a Palestinian on Wednesday in a confrontation over an attempt to steal a vehicle in the occupied West Bank, the police said.

headline.main: Israel: Soldier Kills Palestinian Suspected in Theft
headline.print_headline: Israel: Soldier Kills Palestinian Suspected in Theft
